osyfe.graphic.util

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.graphic.util.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a camera in 3D-space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera(boolean perspective)
      Creates a new camera with either a perspective or orthogonal projection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Camera addRot(float angle, float ax, float ay, float az)
      Rotates the camera.
      Camera addRot(float angle, int axis)
      Rotates the camera about its own coordinate axis.
      Camera addRot(float angle, org.joml.Vector3f axis)
      Rotates the camera.
      Camera addRot(float angle, org.joml.Vector3f position, int axis)
      Rotates the camera around the given position about its own coordinate axis.
      Camera addRot(float angle, org.joml.Vector3f position, org.joml.Vector3f axis)
      Rotates the camera around the given position.

      Translates the camera.

      Translates the camera.

      Gives the screen aspect.

      Gives the specific axis of the camera basis in 3D-space.

      Gives the projection transformation matrix of this camera.

      Gives the view transformation matrix of this camera.

      Sets the scale in the x-direction (default: 1).

      Sets the uniforms Shader.VIEW and Shader.PROJECTION in the given shader.

      Sets the farthest rendered distance (default: 1).

      Sets the nearest rendered distance (default: 1).

      Transforms a given position to screen space.

      Transforms a given position to screen space and stores the result in 'dest'.
